connectorUiConfig.title: Verkada Camera Alerts (CCP)
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The Verkada Camera Alerts data connector provides the capability to ingest [Verkada Camera Alerts](https://apidocs.verkada.com/reference/getnotificationsviewv1) into Microsoft Sentinel using the Verkada REST API. Refer to [Verkada documentation](https://apidocs.verkada.com/reference/getnotificationsviewv1) for more information.

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: Read and Write permissions are required.

customs.name: Verkada API credentials with access to Cameras Endppoint with Read permissions
customs.description: Verkada API requires a Verkada API key to authenticate. [See the documentation to learn more about how to get started with Verkada API](https://apidocs.verkada.com/reference/quick-start-guide)

instructionSteps.description: >**NOTE:** This connector uses Codeless Connecor Platform (CCP) to connect to the Verkada REST API to pull Camera Alerts logs into Microsoft Sentinel.

**STEP 1 - Create Verkada API Key**

See documentation to [setup client credentials authentication](https://developer.verkada.com/guides/authentication/client-credentials/client-credentials-setup/)

**STEP 2 - Allow API Endpoint**

Make sure the Cameras endpoint is enabled in your Verkada API settings.

**STEP 3 - Set Expiration**

Define the API expiration time based on the company policy.

**STEP 4 - Grab Verkada API Key**

Store secret in a safe location.

instructionSteps.title: Connect to Verkada to start collecting Camera Alerts logs to Microsoft Sentinel
